title: To Solve your document management woes
desc: DocuMan™ is a document management software built for consultants by consultants. By combining years of insight obtained from architects, engineers, design professionals and other consultants with technological innovation, this product addresses a key pain point effectively.

features.text: Protect your business by ensuring that your document flow is not disrupted byemployee absence, lack of information, improper delegation. DocuMan™ ensuresthat your drawings and documents are neatly organized and easily retrievable.

Now manage your projects and team members centrally. Assignresponsibilities and rights to users based on levels. Define project scope, classify projects, and retrieve project document status in real-time and more. Save precious time, otherwise lost in tracking documents and increase your organizational productivity.

An advanced check-in and check-out process means that each document is tracked. Access control based on employee levels also means that sensitive information is accessible to only those authorized to view it.

A very common error in consulting firms is the duplication of data and its existence in different systems as different versions. With DocuMan™, each document is labelled via a rule-based numbering system. Multiple versions and revisions can be maintained while document read/write rights can be assigned to different team members.

Manage a project with complete view of documents within a project and their status. Bring project transmittal processes within the document system and improve your overall process. Document history, timesheets and quality of issued documents can be easily tracked.

Leverage our experience with over 4000 architectural and consulting users to bringin greater process and process compliance into your organization. DocuMan™ hasseveral information best-practices built into it, which have been developed afteryears of user experience and insight.

story.h2: DeltaCADD took Stapati to the new way of managing thier workflow and saw 80% increase in their productivity

story.quote: Results were something we coudln’t have ever imagined. We could track the progress of each project and each employee with so much of ease. We were in control again.
story.name: Sandeep Trivedi
